Blog.post: Ok, this is mint. My girlfriend after I broke up with her said she had another boyfriend and she was playing me. Direct quotes from my breakup " i was goung out with another guy when i said i was goin out with u" , "and i didnt mean afukin thing i said". She then planned to insult me more by saying " yup man u must feel pretty dumb eh ". Now if your a close personal friend and you knew why I was going out with her in the first place you would know I actually dont feel dumb. About 5 min before all this started I had giver her a "hilarious " video of a guy skateboarding to download that I had told her I wanted to put on my Blog. This "hilarious" video of a guy skaboarding was of her showing me her body on her webcam. Now what I didnt relize was when she was striping that one night I had a screen recoder playing in the backround to record some other stuff I was doing at the same time. So by the time she finished typing " yup man u must feel pretty dumb eh" the "hilarious" video of the guy skateboarding finished downloading to her. Yeah I felt pretty cool there for a few minutes when she was pleading for me not to post the vid, then I felt kinda bad. Considering Im not planning to post it I enjoyed taunting her that I would. Its great now how she hates me. I love it. What I want to know is if she hated me that much why did she show me the stuff she did? Could it be that she is a ...hmm...whore ? I think this makes me an asshole. But she had it comming. If anybody would care to go throught the legal issues of posting a particular video on my site post it in the comments or urlLink email me . Johnny

If your new to BitTorrent all im going to tell you is your going to want to use it. Its a sweet ass protocol designed for transferring files. I currently use it for all my pirated games and apps although I still stick to urlLink Kazaa Lite Resurrection 0.0.7.6 for music. If anybody has any download sites or bitTorent apps to add to the list post it in the comments or urlLink email me . My fav BitTorrent Applications: urlLink azureus.sourceforge.net urlLink www.bittornado.com Download Sites: urlLink www.suprnova.org Johnny

I am in so deep in this relationship. Quotes from my relationship "im trieing to open up to u and all this and it doesnt seem like u care" , "because it is true and i would never lie 2 u baby i love u and love means trust" , "I was so00o depressed before i ment u u have really chnged me and the way I feel I hope u know how much thatmeans 2 me" , "aww man Johnny uare so0o0 sweet and I LOVE YOU!! with all ym heart and plz dont break it" , "yes I do! johnny I do love you and I havent loved anyone beofre and u are the first guy i hvae ever loved and hopefully the only guy" , "if u break my heart ang will break ur jaw". Wow, I feel like im constantly being interrogated, I am also asked "johnny, do you love me?" every 20 min. Im so fucked. If you want the whole convo file email me at urlLink dehumidifier@hotmail.com Help Johnny
